explanation: To make two stacks of two cubes on pad three and pad two, the task starts by moving the yellow_cube to pad_three. Then, the green_cube is placed on top of the yellow_cube to form the first stack on pad_three. Next, the red_cube is moved to pad_two, and finally, the blue_cube is placed on top of the red_cube to form the second stack on pad_two. The robot arm returns to the home position after each grasp and place action, and also at the end of the task to ensure it follows the rules.
prompt: Make two stacks of two cubes on pad three and pad two
